status.name: priceA
status.descr: 佣金 = [芒果售价 / (1+服务费)-早餐单价*含早数量]* 佣金率

status.name: priceB

status.name: priceD
status.descr: 佣金 = 芒果售价 / (1+服务费)* 佣金率

status.name: priceH

resource.name: price_calculator
resource.status: double salePrice = price.getSalePrice(); double serviceCharge = price.getServiceCharge(); double breakfastNum = price.getIBreakfastNum(); double breakFastPrice = price.getBreakfastPrice(); double commissionRate = price.getCommissionRate(); double calculatedCommission = 0.0; double basePrice = 0.0; calculatedCommission = (salePrice / (1+ serviceCharge ) - breakFastPrice * breakfastNum) * commissionRate; basePrice = salePrice - calculatedCommission; price.setCalculatedCommission(calculatedCommission); price.setBasePrice(basePrice);

double salePrice = price.getSalePrice(); double serviceCharge = price.getServiceCharge(); double breakfastNum = price.getIBreakfastNum(); double breakFastPrice = price.getBreakfastPrice(); double commissionRate = price.getCommissionRate(); double calculatedCommission = 0.0; double basePrice = 0.0; calculatedCommission = ((salePrice- breakFastPrice * breakfastNum) / (1+ serviceCharge)) * commissionRate; basePrice = salePrice - calculatedCommission; price.setCalculatedCommission(calculatedCommission); price.setBasePrice(basePrice);

double salePrice = price.getSalePrice(); double serviceCharge = price.getServiceCharge(); double breakFastPrice = price.getBreakfastPrice(); double commissionRate = price.getCommissionRate(); double calculatedCommission = 0.0; double basePrice = 0.0; calculatedCommission = salePrice * commissionRate; basePrice = salePrice - calculatedCommission; price.setCalculatedCommission(calculatedCommission); price.setBasePrice(basePrice);

double salePrice = price.getSalePrice(); double serviceCharge = price.getServiceCharge(); double breakFastPrice = price.getBreakfastPrice(); double commissionRate = price.getCommissionRate(); double calculatedCommission = 0.0; double basePrice = 0.0; calculatedCommission = (salePrice /(1 + serviceCharge)) * commissionRate; basePrice = salePrice - calculatedCommission; price.setCalculatedCommission(calculatedCommission); price.setBasePrice(basePrice);

double salePrice = price.getSalePrice(); double serviceCharge = price.getServiceCharge(); double breakfastNum = price.getIBreakfastNum(); double breakFastPrice = price.getBreakfastPrice(); double commissionRate = price.getCommissionRate(); double calculatedCommission = 0.0; double basePrice = 0.0; calculatedCommission = (salePrice - breakFastPrice * breakfastNum) * commissionRate; basePrice = salePrice - calculatedCommission; price.setCalculatedCommission(calculatedCommission); price.setBasePrice(basePrice);
